name: Quadratic puzzle 1
description:
Game introduction

The gameplay is mainly jigsaw puzzles, and you can pass the level by moving all the animation image fragments to their original positions. In the upper left corner, the time of stitching the images will also be counted and each level will record the fastest time to complete the puzzle. Can challenge your fastest record.

Game Features

Each game level has a different style of anime girls, and each level can choose the difficulty according to your own preferences. The higher the difficulty, the more fragments need to be spliced. When all the stitching is completed, you can also enter the visit mode, you can use the "W, A, S, D" keys to change the direction of the camera, and the mouse wheel controls the zoom, so that you can see any part you want to see!
